children.name: Product defects

AssertionError: Expected 422 for DELETE after CREATE with status INVALID, got 500. Response: {
    "timestamp" : "2026-02-05T10:51:15.444+00:00",
    "path" : "/gpd/message",
    "status" : 500,
    "error" : "Internal Server Error",
    "requestId" : "bd1eb690-20348"
  }
assert 500 == 422
 +  where 500 = <Response [500]>.status_code
A DELETE message after CREATE INVALID returns 422

AssertionError: Expected 200 for UPDATE status PAID, got 500. Response: {
    "timestamp" : "2026-02-05T10:51:43.196+00:00",
    "path" : "/gpd/message",
    "status" : 500,
    "error" : "Internal Server Error",
    "requestId" : "739cb3d0-20401"
  }

 +  where 500 = <Response [500]>.status_code
An UPDATE message with status PAID is successfully sent after CREATE

AssertionError: assert 422 == 201
 +  where 422 = <Response [422]>.status_code
An RTP is sent to a CBI service with activated fiscal code
An RTP is sent to ICCREA service with activated fiscal code

AssertionError: assert 404 == 201
 +  where 404 = <Response [404]>.status_code
An RTP is sent through ICCREA API

AssertionError: assert 201 == 400
 +  where 201 = <Response [201]>.status_code
Cannot send RTP with an amount over the POSTE limit
Cannot send RTP with expired date
